short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension adds the Rich UI for the open image in tab. It runs with only open the image in tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds the Rich UI for the open image in tab mode on Google Chrome.
It does not eat RAM on no using because runs only open an image on tab.
